amendment.description: To require a report on the feasibility of establishing a scholarship or fellowship program to educate future nuclear engineers at the postsecondary and postgraduate levels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4299 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4299 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6118) To require a report on the feasibility of establishing a scholarship or fellowship program to educate future nuclear engineers at the postsecondary and postgraduate levels.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4299 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4299 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
